item.title: MABS Incident on 2023-07-18 16:05 UTC
item.content:encoded:
[Medium] - Performance Issue on GitHub

Some Android and iOS builds are experiencing performance issues and may fail due to timeouts when downloading resources from GitHub. The issue has been identified, and a fix is being implemented. GitHub Operations has resumed nominal performance and is being monitored.

Jul 18, 20:45 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jul 18, 16:46 UTC
Monitoring - GitHub Operations has resumed nominal performance.

We will keep monitoring the service.

Jul 18, 16:41 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Jul 18, 16:40 UTC
Investigating -

RPM-4197


Both Android and iOS builds are getting their performance affected because of an ongoing GitHub incident.

Some builds might end up failing due to timeouts when downloading resources from GitHub.

item.title: Support Portal
item.content:encoded:
[Medium] - Scheduled Maintenance

Summary: The company will be undergoing scheduled maintenance on June 18 from 03:00 UTC to 05:00 UTC. The Support Portal may be temporarily unavailable during this time, and alternative support channels are encouraged.

Jun 18, 05:00 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Jun 18, 03:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jun 16, 09:41 UTC
Update - We will be undergoing scheduled maintenance during this time.

Jun 16, 09:39 UTC
Scheduled - Our Support Portal will be temporarily unavailable due to a scheduled maintenance on June 18, from 03.00 UTC to 05.00 UTC. During the maintenance window, we encourage you to reach out to our support team through alternative channels (https://www.outsystems.com/legal/success/support-terms-and-service-level-agreements-sla-of-the-outsystems-software/#contact-channels).

We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause and appreciate your understanding.

item.title: Partial System outage
item.content:encoded:
High - Partial Outage of Forge Service

Summary: A partial outage of the Forge Service occurred for one hour, impacting user access. The issue has been identified and fixed, with apologies for any inconvenience caused.

Mar 17, 10:30 UTC
Resolved - We experienced a partial outage that affected our Forge Service. Our team was able to identify the cause and quickly fixed it. This partial outage lasted for one hour and during this period, our users were unable to access the service.
Please accept our apologies for any inconvenience caused.

item.title: Identity provider issues
item.content:encoded:
Feb 3, 16:46 UTC
Resolved - We are happy to inform that the incident has been resolved and the communications with our identity provider are reestablish at 100%.
The OutSystems Community is up and running again.
Sorry for the inconvenience.
Kind regards.

Feb 3, 16:01 UTC
Update - We are continuing to monitor for any further issues.

Feb 3, 12:15 UTC
Monitoring - We are experiencing some isses on our identity provider consider possible errors when loging in some OutSystems properties.
The foloing actions can be affected:
Signup
Changes on the profile
Change password
Change email
Move certifications
Merge activity
Logout

Our Team is working to recover the full operation we will keep you posted on the situation status.

Best regards

item.title: Partial System outage
item.content:encoded:
Jan 31, 22:50 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jan 31, 22:23 UTC
Investigating - We are experiencing some partial infrastructure outage which is causing connection issues with some of our online tools.

The following documentation pages are unavailable at the moment:
- https://success.outsystems.com/documentation/how-to_guides/
- https://success.outsystems.com/support/

To get support, please access directly via https://success.outsystems.com/support/home/

We will update you as soon as we have the website up and running.

item.title: MABS Incident on 2022-09-22 21:00 UTC
item.content:encoded:
Sep 23, 08:48 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Sep 22, 22:00 UTC
Update - The service is back to the normal. The pattern where some iOS builds were failing when fetching external dependencies is no longer observed.

Sep 22, 21:15 UTC
Investigating - We are currently experiencing issues on some iOS builds

item.title: Database Update
item.content:encoded:
Sep 17, 09:31 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Sep 17, 08:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Sep 14, 09:13 UTC
Scheduled - OutSystems will be updating our database for enhanced security. During this 90 minute upgrade, the following applications will be unavailable:

Community, Forge, Training & Documentation, Customer Portal, Customer Onboarding, Intellectual Property Protection Portal, ISV Portal, Partner Center, Website Search, Sizing Tool, Support Portal, Architecture Dashboard (login).

If you need support during this downtime, please visit our Support contacts page: https://www.outsystems.com/legal/success/support-terms-and-service-level-agreements-sla-of-the-outsystems-software/

item.title: AppShield Incident on 2022-06-30 00:03 UTC
item.content:encoded:
Jul 5, 12:58 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jul 4, 19:25 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Customers must update their AppShield Plugin version to 1.5.1 from the Forge to be able to have a successful build on Android, when using AppShield.

Jul 4, 08:39 UTC
Update - We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.

Jul 2, 00:16 UTC
Update - Although the problem is identified, we haven't yet been able to overcome the problem with a satisfactory solution without causing a greater impact.

This incident is only affecting Android builds making use of the AppShield Plugin.

Jul 1, 17:47 UTC
Update - We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.

Jun 30, 15:50 UTC
Update - We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.

Jun 30, 12:36 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Jun 30, 10:50 UTC
Investigating -

RPM-2747

We are currently investigating an issue that is affecting all Android builds using AppShield, preventing these builds to complete successfully. This is independent of MABS Version and of AppShield Plugin Version

item.content:encoded:
May 11, 17:03 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Monitoring - A workaround has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

More information here: https://status.cocoapods.org/

item.title: 2621129 COMMUNITY @EXTRANET
item.content:encoded:
Apr 7, 15:26 UTC
Resolved - We are happy to inform everyone that the issues we were facing are now solved and everything is up and running again.

We would like to thank everyone for your patience and understanding while we were solving these issues.

Apr 7, 14:09 UTC
Investigating - We are experiencing some partial infrastructure outage which is causing connection issues with some of our online tools.

We will update you as soon as we have the website up and running.

item.content:encoded:

Resolved - This incident has been resolved and the customer synchronizations are back to normal

Oct 15, 14:00 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results. The synchronizations are now recovering and everything should get back to normal in a few hours.

Oct 15, 10:53 UTC
Investigating - We are experiencing some partial infrastructure outage which is causing delays on Architecture Dashboard synchronization analysis.

We will update you as soon as we have the website up and running.

Investigating - We are currently investigating an issue that is causing some MABS builds to fail or timeout, indiscriminately.

This means that, if your build was previously working and now failed, retrying might fix the issue.

item.title: 2519714 COMMUNITY @EXTRANET is Down
item.content:encoded:
Sep 2, 09:24 UTC
Resolved - We've released a fix for this issue, and all OutSystems pages are up and running once again.
Our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this may have caused.
We are available for any insight through our official channels.

Sep 2, 08:56 UTC
Monitoring - After some analysis on this, we have verified that the issue and all our tools are back online.

If you have some issues with our tools please contact us through the official channels available to you.

Our sincerely apologies for the inconvenience.

Sep 2, 08:32 UTC
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Sep 2, 08:20 UTC
Investigating - We are currently investigating this issue.

item.title: MABS Incident on 2021-06-02 08:45 UTC
item.content:encoded:
Jun 2, 12:48 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jun 2, 09:43 UTC
Monitoring - GitHub services were recovered and we are monitoring the results.

Jun 2, 08:53 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and it's related to a partial outage in GitHub (https://www.githubstatus.com/incidents/76nv9h8pmkv4)

Jun 2, 08:50 UTC
Investigating - We are currently investigating an issue with GitHub integrations.

item.title: MABS Incident on 2021-05-04 19:10 UTC
item.content:encoded:
May 5, 08:35 UTC
Resolved - All services nominal. This incident has been resolved.

May 5, 08:04 UTC
Monitoring - JitPack is now back up. We will be monitoring the service, but do not expect any issues building Android applications.

May 5, 01:26 UTC
Update - We have further restored Android building capability in the service. Android builds performed using MABS 6 should now succeed unless there are some custom dependencies still hosted in JitPack, which is still facing downtime issues. We will be monitoring JitPack's recovery progress closely and react accordingly.

May 5, 00:40 UTC
Update - We have migrated several core dependencies hosted on JitPack in order to restore some Android building capability in the service. Android builds performed in MABS 7 should succeed unless there are some custom dependencies still hosted in JitPack, which is still facing downtime issues. We are now attempting to restore Android building capability to older MABS versions.

May 4, 22:34 UTC
Update - We are working on a fix to mitigate the effects of the JitPack outage.

May 4, 19:42 UTC
Identified - One of our third party providers, Jitpack, is down. This only affects Android builds. We are investigating possible workarounds.

May 4, 19:29 UTC
Investigating - We have detected an issue which is affecting most Android builds.

item.title: Outsystems Community
item.content:encoded:
Apr 15, 08:39 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Apr 15, 08:09 UTC
Monitoring - All systems are back up. We are monitoring the site.

Apr 15, 07:59 UTC
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Apr 15, 07:00 UTC
Investigating - We are having a degradation on Outsystems Community. We are currently investigating.

item.title: MABS Incident on 2021-04-13 07:50 UTC
item.content:encoded:
Apr 13, 12:24 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Apr 13, 11:10 UTC
Monitoring - We're not experiencing the issue of fetching dependencies from CocoaPods CDN anymore. We are monitoring the results on MABS.

Apr 13, 08:04 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and is related to CocoaPods CDN fetching dependencies.

Builds failing with messages mentioning it failed to install some plugin might be related to this issue:
Build error message example:
"Error installing Cordova plugin: com.outsystems.plugins.logger."

We are investigating a possible workaround

Apr 13, 07:51 UTC
Investigating - We are currently investigating affecting most iOS builds.
